name: Bubble Xplosion
description:
Bubble Xplosion is bubble shooter game. Move your finger to pop the target, match 3 or more identical bubbles to make them burst and clear all the bubbles to level up with this free match 3 bubble game.
Take a break and relax yourself in this amazingly fun Bubble Shooter paradise.

Game features:
+ More than 100 fun game levels to challenge your brain
+ Tons of unique bubbles and obstacles to discover
+ Collect colorful bubbles and unleash powerful boosters
+ Fluent shooting experience
+ Smooth animations and cool gameplay
+ Play without WIFI at anywhere
+ Free updates with new levels and challenges
